author: MrDarksword123

text: @Teamflare Grunt I honestly take it back, I just replayed through this temple today after not playing the game for 3 years and it was pretty easy compared to the first and second times I did it.  Idk I guess I get better when I get older.  I actually found it FUN.
author: MrDarksword123

text: I think it's like that indeed,much harder when you're a kid. Just like the Ice Path in Pokémon Crystal.
author: Thib L. Est.

text: @Teamflare Grunt yea, I first played this game when it came out and I was around 14.  I played this one before wind waker, twilight princess and skyward sword (well obviously before TP and SS cause they weren't out yet).  But after playing those three and coming back to this one 10 years later, I must say this one is quite a bit easier than those 3.

author: Arisu Mizuki

text: @Shanty Boonstabo Like a true millennial, you assume the negative over the objective. Feelings over logic. Emotions over thought
author: Brian Scalabrine aka GOAT

text: Not really I'm just saying that it was a simple comment that didn't really need deconstructing. You say objective but saying that any Zelda game has some of the best music  is an opinion. And it's up to the op what was "more important" to say. Saying the comment had a snide tone to it isnt me assuming emotions over thought or whatever pseudo rational nonsense you said there.
author: Arisu Mizuki

text: @Shanty Boonstabo Refer to my previous comment
author: Brian Scalabrine aka GOAT

text: @Brian Scalabrine aka GOAT Whatever, no point in continuing this dead end conversation anyway.
